/circle6 Ensure that the placenta is delivered completely with all 
the membranes.  Retained placental fragments or pieces of 
membrane will cause PPH. Th is can be suspected if a portion 
of the maternal surface of the placenta is missing or the 
membranes with their vessels are torn.
/circle6 If the placenta is not delivered after 30 minutes of inj. 
Oxytocin or Tablet Misoprostol, refer the woman to an FRU. 
Information on the drugs given,
